feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Windy. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.summary: Showers. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
